name: Inazuma
text: When this Character has 7000 power or more, they gain Banish (When a character deals damage, the target card is trashed without activating its Trigger.)

effect.text: When this Character has 7000 power or more, they gain Banish (When a character deals damage, the target card is trashed without activating its Trigger.)

meta.notes: Card is a sample image with 'SAMPLE' watermark. Power value is 5000, not 7000 as stated in the trigger condition. The trigger text is printed as 'Banish (When a character deals damage, the target card is trashed without activating its Trigger.)' which is a standard Banish effect.
